items.title: Create photorealistic house from scratch to end in AutoCAD
items.headline: Create a 3D house, make animated walkthrough video and make photorealistic rendering with this course
objectives_summary: Students will be able to make their own 3D architectural models
Students will be able to create presentation ready renderings
Students will be able to create 2D plans from the 3D drawing

items.title: Sketchup Architect From 2D to 3D
items.headline: How to build a 3D Model from a 2D cad plan and render
objectives_summary: Students will learn how to quickly build simple to complex 3-D models in sketch up
Build 3-D Architectural models with terrains doors windows and materials

items.title: Passive Solar Design Series - Understanding Sun
items.headline: First step to designing passive solar buildings
objectives_summary: Recall fundamentals
Understand solar geometry
Use a sunpath diagram

items.title: The Complete AutoCad 2020 2D+3D Course
items.headline: Learn AutoCad 2020 From Professional AutoCad Trainer (AutoCad 2020 Project Based Training Both In 2D And 3D)
objectives_summary: Make and edit their own Auto Cad Drawings, Plans and Layouts
Work with projects like floor plans, mechanical drafting
3D Modeling And Rendering

items.title: Learning Autodesk AutoCAD 2016
items.headline: A Beginners Guide to Computer Aided Design (CAD)
objectives_summary: Once you have completed this training course, you will be fully capable of using AutoCAD 2016 to create your own 2D drawings
Become more familiar with AutoCAD 2016

items.title: Tiny House Design Part 2 - Construction
items.headline: A Comprehensive 101
objectives_summary: Understand the options they have when it comes to constructing their tiny house and be able to select what will work best for their particular situation.
Know the parts of a wall/roof/floor and what each layer is for.
Have an understanding of how to pick out windows and insulation for their tiny house.

items.title: ARCHICAD 23 - Beginner and Intermediate Level
items.headline: Learn ARCHICAD BIM Technology!
objectives_summary: The student will learn on practice the ARCHICAD BIM Technology  (classes taught in International version - English, with audio in English).
Make an architectural project from start to finish, with all the technical drawings of floor plans, sections, façades, details, schedules and 3D rendered model.

items.title: Autodesk Revit Architecture 2018
items.headline: Learn how to use Autodesk Revit to design civil constructions and buildings
objectives_summary: Know the environment of the software
Be confortable with commands and concepts of designing in Revit
Design basic elements such as walls, doors, indows and floors

items.title: Daylighting 101 : Technical Terms
items.headline: Primer on daylighting with the basic concepts explained in line with real world application
objectives_summary: Complete clarity of technical terms
Know how of terms
Recognize practical application

items.headline: Develop a core skill for architectural design and visualization by learning to read all types of architectural drawings

Understand how architectural plans are constructed so you can make some of your own
Understand a complete building in plan form so you can build a 3d model of it

items.title: AutoCAD 2020 2D-3D & Electrical
items.headline: Become Zero To Hero in AutoCAD 2020 2D-3D & Electrical. Put yourself on a fast track!
objectives_summary: AutoCAD 2020 in 50 lectures (FAST TRACK).
Different 2D & 3D commands in detail.
To Make and edit their own AutoCAD Drawings.

objectives_summary: Learn about the definitions, benefits and disadvantages of Enterprise Architecture.
Learn about the roles and responsibilities involved in Enterprise Architecture.
Study the different principles of Enterprise Architecture.

items.title: How to make sugar craft hair styles for your models
items.headline: A guide to creating hair styles for your sugar craft models
objectives_summary: How to create sugar craft hair styles for models
develop your skills and confidence

modeling Real existing tower building in Dubai

Understand impact on daylighting

items.title: Introduction to green buildings

objectives_summary: Understand environmental impacts of buildings
List design strategies for green buildings
Discuss sustainability in the context of green buildings
